message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split. This offers a fair compromise considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is a more equitable starting point, considering the diminishing value of the money.  Let's work towards a fair solution.

Considering the inflationary effect on the value of money, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a balance between our shares while accounting for the decreasing worth of funds in subsequent rounds.
